title: Kirby Model 509 Owners Manual from 1949
content:
1. Information such as the country: USA  
2. Age of the sample 1949  
3. I am trying to reproduce the old manual and would like to know the fonts used so I can re-create the manual to be as close to the original one as possible.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162240im_/http:/typophile.com/files/509_Font_Test_4811.jpg)

Font: 

 American Garamond & Garamond 3 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162240/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: mbpb45

comments.content:
Garamond (could be one of several versions):  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/american-garamond/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317162240/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/american-garamond/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/american-garamond/")
